long_description: The Sunday Afternoons Sun Tripper hat is specifically designed to protect you from UV rays and keep you cool during warm-weather adventures. Lightweight nylon fabric blocks 98% of the sun's UV rays for an excellent UPF 50+ rating. External vents allow cooling airflow to pass through the side mesh panels. Folding brim lets you easily stash the hat away inside a pants pocket. Internal sweatband wicks moisture from your brow. Internal crown pocket provides secure storage for small items. Rear shock cord adjustment accommodates most head sizes.
